summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 8 priority open recommendations for the General Services Administration (GSA) as of May 2020. For example, we recommended that GSA...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: General Services Administration
